channel.title: InYourBones Daily Music News
channel.description: Top 5 daily music stories handpicked by InYourBones

item.title: Lady Gaga Dances for the Dead at the 2025 VMAs: Watch
item.description: 🎶 Gaga bringing the 🔥 with a hauntingly fierce performance at the 2025 VMAs! 💃👻 #LadyGaga #VMAs2025

item.title: Sabrina Carpenter Gets Wet (in the Rain!) During 2025 VMAs ‘Tears’ Performance
item.description: ☔️ Sabrina Carpenter brings the heat 🔥 with a wet and wild performance at the 2025 VMAs! 💧🎶 #RainOrShine #VMAs2025

item.title: Young Widows Pull Catalog From Spotify Over CEO’s Investment In AI Weapons
item.description: 🎶 Rock on, Young Widows! Taking a stand against AI weapons with their music catalog 🚫🎵 #MusicNews #SpotifyShutdown

item.title: Bruce Loose, Vocalist of Hardcore Titans Flipper, Dies at 66
item.description: RIP to the legendary Bruce Loose 🕊️🤘 Your punk spirit will forever echo through the music world. #BruceLoose #RIPBruceLoose

item.title: Charli XCX Just Made Her Acting Debut In Three Movies. The Reviews Are In.
item.description: 🎬 Charli XCX slaying on the big screen! 🌟 Check out the buzz on her acting debut now! #TripleThreat #CharliXCX #NewStarOnTheRise 🎤
